channel.title: New build options
channel.description:
Hello,im trying to build latest Whonix from source from wiki instructions,on 14.0.0.2.6 workstation and host Debian stretch and still fails,i guess because of new build options,as i noticed they have changed from previous 13 version,but wiki page do not document it yet
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Build_Documentation/14_full
Thanks.

item.title: New build options
item.dc:creator: bmtkn1
item.description:
Sure i do,there is developers tag there,i have no problems building 13 version,on 14 stucked.

I could post log errors if you could check it.
